text: State unemployment rates in August 2025 ranged from 1.9% in SD to 5.5% in CA and 6% in DC.
Q1 2025 real state GDP growth over the year ranged from -0.7% in IA to 3.5% in AL and AR.
Q2 2025 house price growth over the year ranged from -7.6% in DC to 8.0% in NY.
Among states, August 2025 average weekly earnings ranged from NM’s $983 to WA’s $1,464.
In August 2025, federal gov. jobs dropped year-over-year in all 50 states and DC except TX.
TN’s real accommodation and food services GDP has grown 48 percent over the past 20 years.
In August 2025, retail employment fell year-over-year in 22 states and DC.
FL’s annual house price change in Q2 2025 was negative for the first time since Q4 2011.
Every state and DC saw year-over-year retail GDP growth exceed 2% in real terms in Q1 2025.
